name: first steps (greenphox)
description:
A game about the first steps of humanity.

Make colonies, spread your influence and conquer the land of your opponents.

Its v1.0 and the tutorial still isn't sp good... here is what you need to know:

you have 3 possible actions:

make colony  (left click on population map   ,    -1wealth)

make army  (left click on army map    ,   -1wealth)

disband army  (right vlivk on army map    ,    +1wealth)
